name: I Owe Billions in Debt, So I Was Forced to Work for an Evil God
author: 衣月
content: Overworked corporate drone Zhou Chen transmigrates into a magic-powered metropolis, only to inherit a dying teenager’s sky-high debt: over 10 billion in loan shark interest.Even worse, the original body’s final act was a failed summoning of an evil god, leaving Zhou Chen bound by a cursed contract.
